extension.summary: IP-Symcon integration for XBMC player events.
extension.description: Integrates with IP-Symcon via SOAP API to run various scripts in IP-Symcon on XBMC player events like playback started, playback paused etc.
extension.disclaimer: Feel free to use and modify this script to suite your needs. For more information visit http://github.com/aseith/xbmc-ipsymcon.
